newsitem.title: USA: Great Western rejects offer from Ahmanson.
newsitem.headline: Great Western rejects offer from Ahmanson.

text.p: Great Western Financial Corp on Wednesday rejected a negotiation offer from H.F. Ahmanson & Co saying it remains strongly committed to its strategic merger agreement with Washington Mutual Inc.
Great Western said it is working closely with Washington Mutual to move forward with the merger.

Great Western also said it continues to oppose Ahmanson's consent solicitation and it strongly urges stockholders not to sign any consent card sent by Ahmanson. The company asked stockholders to discard Ahmanson's white consent card.
Great Western said it believes that a combination with Washington Mutual will provide stockholders with a superior value opportunity.
